Export.name: sql
Export.label: 事假
Export.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RECORD_ID,
 ORGANIZATION_ID,
 ORGANIZATION_LABEL,
 WORK_NUMBER,
 USER_FULL_LABEL,
 ENTRY_DATE,
 MATERNITY,
 NURSING,
 MISCARRIAGE,
 VISIT,
 PATERNITY,
 TOTAL
 FROM (SELECT PM_ORGANIZATION_DI.Find_Main_Organization_By_User(USER_ID) ORGANIZATION_ID,
 PM_ORGANIZATION_DI.Find_Main_Org_Label_By_User(USER_ID) ORGANIZATION_LABEL,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_DI.Get_Work_Number_By_User_Id(USER_ID) WORK_NUMBER,
 PM_USER_DI.Get_Full_Label(USER_ID) USER_FULL_LABEL,
 TO_CHAR(ENTRY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENTRY_DATE,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Format_Time_Span_By_Time(PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Get_Summaries_Apply_Time('PL', USER_ID,'${BEGIN_DATE}', '${END_DATE}')) MATERNITY,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Format_Time_Span_By_Time(PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Get_Summaries_Apply_Time('NU',USER_ID, '${BEGIN_DATE}','${END_DATE}')) NURSING,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Format_Time_Span_By_Time(PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Get_Summaries_Apply_Time('MI', USER_ID,'${BEGIN_DATE}', '${END_DATE}')) MISCARRIAGE,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Format_Time_Span_By_Time(PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Get_Summaries_Apply_Time('PV',USER_ID,'${BEGIN_DATE}','${END_DATE}')) VISIT,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Format_Time_Span_By_Time(PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Get_Summaries_Apply_Time('PA',USER_ID,'${BEGIN_DATE}','${END_DATE}')) PATERNITY,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Format_Time_Span_By_Time(PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Get_Summaries_Maternity_Time(USER_ID,'${BEGIN_DATE}','${END_DATE}')) TOTAL
 FROM PM_USER_COMPANY
 ORDER BY ORGANIZATION_ID)
